issue.title: [CF 777] Addition of condition to check if inventory item has activation
issue.body:
I was trying to add a generic CD timer for trinkets and couldn't find a way to check if the trinket in a given slot had an on use activation.
It would help me out if there was a condition to check if an item had an on-use activation.
I think via GetInventoryItemCooldown(player, 14) it can be checked, where the 1st and 3rd return parameters would be 0 if the no item was equipped or if the item had no CD (and thus will most probably not have an on-use ability).

I also noticed that I couldn't reference items in conditions via the slot number (e.g. 13 or 14 for trinket slots), but this might be an oversight on my end.


> Posted by CurseForge user salp | Imported from CurseForge issue #777 | Raw

comments.body:
This, as a Lua condition, should work just fine:

``` GetItemSpell(GetInventoryItemID("player", 13)) ```

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
